input.sentences: [male] was hanging out with his friends watching the big game .
[male] brought over some location scorpion pepper wings | but did not warn anyone .
[male] had a severe allergic reaction to the peppered wings !
his airway started to swell and everything started to blur as they rushed him to the er .
this is the last thing poor [male] ever saw .
output.sentences: The guys are hanging out watching football.
One of their favorite dishes are buffalo wings that are scorpion hot!
After eating one wing, one of guys had a reaction and landed flat on his back on the floor.
The reaction to the hot sauce resulted in a rushed trip to ER when we noticed the swelling.
The trip was a blur to the poor guy who was so sick.
